kdeconnect-error.no-devices: No device running KDE Connect found
kdeconnect-error.unavailable-title: kdeconnectd does not seem to be running!
kdeconnect-error.unavailable-desc: Make sure you've installed the KDE Connect Application on your system and that it has started the kdeconnectd daemon

qdbus-error.unavailable-desc: Make sure qdbus (or qdbus6 on some systems) is installed on your system
